Hii

<object style="height: 390px; width: 640px"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/77kdzQFxqGo?version=3"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/77kdzQFxqGo?version=3" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowfullscreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" width="640" height="390"></object>

Here you have my Crane wen you trigger the Crane rotate 180 and the container, and rope folow the rotation. i hade problem wen i parent the normal rope to rotation, but my friend esquenoas help me to use env_laser with rope texture and its work perfekt no error and no lag. My friend valera made 3d skybox for the water and i have change the black texture a bit under water in the 3d skybox.  

*For the Crane you can ad buttom ore make it driveble and you can change container physbox to somthing els.
*This prefabes are great for zombi, deathrun ore other maps
* I m using this prefabs to my new Race map, wen car ore player trigger this area it start to move. I give you the idea off this prefabes and its up to you how you will use it in your map. If you need help to set up this diferent then ask me to help you. 

I hope you like it have fun =)
